unit_learning_outcomes.description: Demonstrate a comprehensive understanding of past, current cyber threats and future trends in high tech crime.
Demonstrate a comprehensive understanding of strategies and steps to investigate digital evidence.
Understand, analyse, and critically discuss different types of cyber crime activities with respect to the motivations, methods of operation of offenders, and the types of victims/targets.
Analyse the impact of cyber crime on government, businesses, society and individuals.

enrolment_rules.description: Admission to MPICT or MCPICT or GradDipPICT or GradDipCPICT or PGCertPICT or MPICTMIntSecSt or MCPICTMIntSecSt or MIntSecStud or GradDipIntSecStud or GradCertIntell or MCTerrorism or MCyberSec or GradDipSecStudCr or GradCertSecStudCr or MIntell or MSecStrategicStud or MCrim or MSecStrategicStudMCrim or MSecStrategicStudMIntell or MSecStrategicStudMCyberSec or MSecStrategicStudMCTerrorism or MIntellMCrim or MIntellMCyberSec or MIntellMCTerrorism or MCyberSecMCTerrorism or MCyberSecMCrim or MCTerrorismMCrim or Master of Cyber Security Analysis or ((Admission to BSecStudMCTerrorism or BSecStudMCrim or MBusAnalytics or BSecStudMCyberSecAnalysis or BSecStudMIntell or BSecStudMSecStrategicStud) and (10cp at 6000 level or 10cp at 8000 level))

assessments.description: Research Essay on Specific Cyber Crime Issue

data.unit_offering_text:
Session 2, Fully online/virtual
Session 2, Weekday attendance, North Ryde
Session 2, Special circumstances
data.subject_search_title: PICT8040 - Cyber Crime and Cyber Policing

academic_org.value: Department of Security Studies and Criminology

data.description: Cybercrime refers to an array of criminal activity including offences against computer data and systems, computer-related offences, content offences, and copyright offences. While early computer hackers were more interested in youthful exploration, modern cybercrime is increasingly about criminal profit and this is reflected in the involvement of transnational organised crime groups. This unit will explore the types of cybercrime, the perpetrators, and investigation techniques.
data.search_title: PICT8040 - Cyber Crime and Cyber Policing
